numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed one thing about this graph.
2. Without the legacy boost, the value drops around the 70th income rank.
3. Without the legacy boost, the value drops around the 80th income rank.
4. For legacy students, the value grows around the 70th income rank.
5. For legacy students, the value grows around the 80th income rank.
6. I noticed another thing about the x-axis.
7. The x-axis increases by 20 in many places.
8. At the end, the x-axis increases by 9.9.
9. I think that the authors did this.
10. I think that the authors wanted the system to seem more rigged than it is.
11. I wonder how this has changed over time.
12. I wonder whether this has gotten better over time.
13. I wonder whether this has gotten worse over time.
16. This graph shows that the college system is unfair.
17. The college system affects everyone who applies to colleges.
18. The title is: A Look Into Unfair Biases In Colleges.
